title: Research
text: The PhD project focuses on improving the Dutch labour market forecasts by assessing the reliability and exploring the potential of using additional data and applying different estimation techniques.

title: Research
text:
NetMob 2024
The NetMob conference is a primary conference on the analysis of mobile phone datasets in social, urban, societal and industrial problems.
NetMob 2024 took place on 7-9 October 2024 at the World Bank Group in Washington D.C., U.S.A.
As part of the conference Data Challenge, we were invited to present a poster.

title: About
text:
As trained econometrician, I am interested in modelling and forecasting time series. My research focuses on labour market forecasting.
Under the co-supervision of SBE’s Department of Quantitative Economics (QE), my research aims to refine the econometric methodology underlying ROA’s labour market forecasting models. The project focuses on improving the labour market forecasts by assessing the reliability and exploring the potential of using additional data and applying different estimation techniques.

title: Roy Meijer
text:
Hi!
I am a PhD candidate at the Research Centre for Education and the Labour Market (ROA), Maastricht University.
